quest.name: Savior of Skysteel
journal: Stephanivien awaits your introduction with undisguised enthusiasm.

Stephanivien once more welcomes you to the Skysteel Manufactory, and offers to introduce you to the wonders of machinistry. Speak with the enthusiastic inventor to indicate your readiness to undertake your first lesson.

You inform Stephanivien of your desire to learn about firearms, much to the inventor's delight. It would appear, however, that the manufactory's master of marksmanship has resigned his post at the worst possible timing. Join Stephanivien at Camp Overlook in outer La Noscea, and aid him and Joye in their quest to win back the workshop's reluctant employee.
You rendezvous with Stephanivien and Joye in outer La Noscea, and agree to assist them with their inquiries. Speak with the soldiers of Camp Overlook, and ask after the retired instructor.
The inhabitants you speak with at Camp Overlook seem less than welcoming towards the man you seek. Return to Stephanivien, and share the information you have learned.
You rejoin Stephanivien and Joye just outside the camp, and explain where the master of marksmanship might be found. Head towards the lift, and speak with Stephanivien once more.

You arrive at the infirmary to find Stephanivien entreating the master of marksmanship─a Roegadyn by the name of Rostnsthal─to return to the manufactory. After a tense confrontation wherein Joye displays her uncanny skill with a firearm, Rostnsthal reluctantly agrees to test your potential with a trial lesson. Take up the weapon you received from Stephanivien, and convince the instructor of the seriousness of your intentions.
objectives: Speak with Stephanivien at Camp Overlook.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: （★未使用／削除予定★）

dialogue.name: STEPHANIVIEN
dialogue.text: （★未使用／削除予定★）

dialogue.name: STEPHANIVIEN
dialogue.text: （★未使用／削除予定★）

dialogue.name: STEPHANIVIEN
dialogue.text: （★未使用／削除予定★）

dialogue.name: STEPHANIVIEN
dialogue.text: Forename, is it? Well, Forename, allow me to welcome you once more to the Skysteel Manufactory!

dialogue.name: STEPHANIVIEN
dialogue.text: As I mentioned before, 'tis our charge to develop and manufacture weapons designed for slaying dragon invaders. ...But pray forget about those tired old inventions.

dialogue.name: STEPHANIVIEN
dialogue.text: The future lies in machinistry─a technology that weds the genius of Master Garlond's magitek with traditional aetherology. Every single one of my latest creations employs the principles of this unique discipline.

dialogue.name: STEPHANIVIEN
dialogue.text: And in the steady hands of trained machinists, my new inventions are going to alter the very face of warfare!

dialogue.name: STEPHANIVIEN
dialogue.text: Though I would dearly love to expand upon my revolutionary theories, we should begin by familiarizing you with the tools of the trade, so to speak. Have you time now for a brief lesson...?

dialogue.name: STEPHANIVIEN
dialogue.text: （★未使用／削除予定★）

dialogue.name: STEPHANIVIEN
dialogue.text: Splendid! Now, the first thing you must learn is the proper technique for handling a fire─

dialogue.name: STEPHANIVIEN
dialogue.text: Hmmm. Where in the hells is our master of marksmanship? I swear the man is never about when I need him most.

dialogue.name: STEPHANIVIEN
dialogue.text: How dreadfully embarrassing. Here I've mercilessly piqued your interest, and now I must ask you to call again at a later convenience.

dialogue.name: STEPHANIVIEN
dialogue.text: Mayhap the next time you visit, our instructor will deign to put in an appearance. Then we can outfit you with the equipment necessary to learn basic marksmanship, and I might explain to you the particulars of the machinist's profession.

dialogue.name: JOYE
dialogue.text: (-Anxious Voice-)I-I'm afraid he's gone for good this time, me lordship! ...Left a letter of resignation on your workbench, and all.

dialogue.name: STEPHANIVIEN
dialogue.text: Confound the man! We cannot afford to lose such a pivotal employee at this crucial juncture in our growth!

dialogue.name: STEPHANIVIEN
dialogue.text: Joye! Prepare mine accoutrements! I shall drag that scoundrel back by the lapels if need be!

dialogue.name: JOYE
dialogue.text: B-But, me lordship! We ain't even sure of where to start lookin'...

dialogue.name: STEPHANIVIEN
dialogue.text: ...You make a salient point, my dear. Hmmm. My prospectometer points to the lands of La Noscea. Ah, yes, I should've realized that he would return to his homeland.

dialogue.name: JOYE
dialogue.text: L-La Noscea, me lordship? Are you sure you want to go there? I hear it's a nasty place, where folk'll clout you across the face as soon as look at you.

dialogue.name: STEPHANIVIEN
dialogue.text: Aye, well, I must admit to little familiarity with its environs. ...Hark, Joye! The prospectometer chirps again!

dialogue.name: STEPHANIVIEN
dialogue.text: Of course! Our aspiring machinist! We shall have the worldly Forename here act as our guide!

dialogue.name: STEPHANIVIEN
dialogue.text: For an explorer who has braved the harshest corners of Eorzea, the wilds of La Noscea must be akin to a garden path! Is that not so?

dialogue.name: Q1
dialogue.text: Is that not so?

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: Aye, 'tis but a garden path!

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: Er, I wouldn't go that far...

dialogue.name: STEPHANIVIEN
dialogue.text: You see, Joye? My prospectometer never steers me awry. You will consent to guide us, then, Forename?

dialogue.name: STEPHANIVIEN
dialogue.text: Now, now─no false modesty! Whatever knowledge you have of the place must far exceed ours, no matter your protestations. You will consent to guide us, will you not?

dialogue.name: STEPHANIVIEN
dialogue.text: Then 'tis settled!

dialogue.name: STEPHANIVIEN
dialogue.text: Joye here, in addition to her loyal service to House Haillenarte, is the finest shot in the manufactory. As a novice machinist, I suggest you mark her technique well during our little jaunt to La Noscea.

dialogue.name: STEPHANIVIEN
dialogue.text: ...Speaking of which, we must needs decide upon a somewhat less vague destination. Ah, I seem to recall our absent instructor mentioning companions from a “Camp Overlook.” Let that be our first port of call!

dialogue.name: STEPHANIVIEN
dialogue.text: We must have our master of marksmanship back...

dialogue.name: JOYE
dialogue.text: House Haillenarte gave me work as a maid, but his lordship insisted I try me hand at bein' a machinist...

dialogue.name: JOYE
dialogue.text: Ugh, what a stench! I think I'm going to be sick...

dialogue.name: STEPHANIVIEN
dialogue.text: So, this is Camp Overlook. Indeed, its inhabitants do seem the type to clout a man in the face in place of a “how do you do?”

dialogue.name: STEPHANIVIEN
dialogue.text: Shall we make some inquiries after our prematurely retired instructor? Let us rendezvous at this spot once we've gathered what intelligence we may.

dialogue.name: SOLDIERA01696
dialogue.text: A bloke late o' Ishgard? Aye, there was a stranger come about, askin' after one of our lads. Told 'im the sorry sod 'e was lookin' for was in the cabin by the lift, restin' up from an axe wound.

dialogue.name: SOLDIERA01696
dialogue.text: A bloke late o' Ishgard? Aye, there was a stranger come about, askin' after one of ours. Told 'im the sorry sod 'e was lookin' for was in the cabin by the lift, restin' up from an axe wound.

dialogue.name: SOLDIERB01696
dialogue.text: ...Aye, I've seen 'im, alright. Got 'imself a cold reception, too. Ye can't come apologizin' for a deed a decade old, an' just expect to be forgiven...

dialogue.name: SOLDIERB01696
dialogue.text: ...Aye, I've seen 'im, alright. Got 'imself a cold reception, too. Ye can't come apologizin' for a deed a decade old, an' just expect to be forgiven...

dialogue.name: SOLDIERC01696
dialogue.text: Hm? Ye mean that big Roegadyn bastard? Ye'll find 'im pacin' the boards in front o' the infirmary. Some o' the lads seem to know the bloke, but no bugger seems eager to say 'ow...

dialogue.name: SOLDIERC01696
dialogue.text: Hm? Ye mean that big Roegadyn bastard? Ye'll find 'im pacin' the boards in front o' the infirmary. Some o' the lads seem to know the bloke, but none of 'em is eager to say 'ow...

dialogue.name: STEPHANIVIEN
dialogue.text: How fared your interrogations? 'Twould seem our man came here but to visit an old acquaintance.

dialogue.name: STEPHANIVIEN
dialogue.text: ...In the vicinity of the winch, you say? Let us investigate this infirmary, then!

dialogue.name: STEPHANIVIEN
dialogue.text: Were the conditions of your employment not satisfactory? Return with us to the manufactory, and we can discuss more favorable terms!

dialogue.name: STEPHANIVIEN
dialogue.text: I understand that Ishgardians presently accord machinists rather less than the respect they deserve, but I promise you, our worth shall shine through in due time! People will clamor to learn our profession!

dialogue.name: STEPHANIVIEN
dialogue.text: You cannot abandon us now, Rostnsthal! Think of the future!

dialogue.name: ROSTNSTHAL
dialogue.text: Leave me be! One more step, an' I'll blow yer yappin' jaw off!

dialogue.name: STEPHANIVIEN
dialogue.text: Joye! If you please!

dialogue.name: JOYE
dialogue.text: You shite-eatin' bastard! Next time I'll aim for the shaft 'twixt your thighs!

dialogue.name: STEPHANIVIEN
dialogue.text: Are you not proud? 'Twas you who taught Joye everything she knows about shooting...and spitting colorful profanity, besides.

dialogue.name: ROSTNSTHAL
dialogue.text: Aye, the lass's learned me lessons well. Well enough to be yer new master o' marksmanship, I'd wager.

dialogue.name: STEPHANIVIEN
dialogue.text: Do you think so!? Oh, but no, Joye is far too busy with her duties at the manor house.

dialogue.name: STEPHANIVIEN
dialogue.text: And besides! We have this budding machinist who is simply dying to learn from the great Rostnsthal!

dialogue.name: ROSTNSTHAL
dialogue.text: Buffalo shite. Any scrag who's known me would rather I did the dyin'.

dialogue.name: STEPHANIVIEN
dialogue.text: Oooh, just look at you─the epitome of a roguish swashbuckler! Why ever did you cease brandishing your weapon in that fashion?

dialogue.name: ROSTNSTHAL
dialogue.text: 'Cause only pirate scum 'old a firearm like this. An' I ain't gonna teach the machinist way to no 'opeless, sausage-fingered 'venturer what ye dragged in off the street.

dialogue.name: STEPHANIVIEN
dialogue.text: Then...you are saying that if our sausage-fingered adventurer shows a glimmer of hope, you will consent to instruct herhim!?

dialogue.name: STEPHANIVIEN
dialogue.text: Did you hear that, Forename!? This is your chance to display your aptitude for marksmanship!

dialogue.name: STEPHANIVIEN
dialogue.text: Here─I took the liberty of packing some extra tools of the trade. Convince our reluctant instructor that you are serious in your intentions!

dialogue.name: ROSTNSTHAL
dialogue.text: Ye know, lasslad, ye strike me as mighty familiar... Could swear ye was around when... Bah, ye know what? Forget it.

dialogue.name: ROSTNSTHAL
dialogue.text: Hmph. Ye've the look of a Lominsan 'venturer about ye.

dialogue.name: ROSTNSTHAL
dialogue.text: ...Not from around these parts, are ye?

dialogue.name: ROSTNSTHAL
dialogue.text: Fine, Stephanivien. I'll give yer whelp one bloody chance─one lesson to see what she's'e's made of.

dialogue.name: STEPHANIVIEN
dialogue.text: The fate of the Skysteel Manufactory─nay, the very future of machinistry─is in your sausage-fingered hands! Take up your weapon, and aim for the stars!

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: （★未使用／削除予定★）

obj.n: So You Want to Be a Machinist
